Tiger Claw Rake [Attack Technique].name: Tiger Claw Rake [Attack Technique]
Tiger Claw Rake [Attack Technique].flavor: You sprint across the battlefield, and your tiger claw tears your foe and leaves it in debilitating agony.
Tiger Claw Rake [Attack Technique].onHit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. If the target moves more than 2 squares on its next turn, it takes 5 damage.
Tiger Claw Rake [Attack Technique].special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
Tiger Claw Rake [Attack Technique].effect: You move your speed + 2, ignoring difficult terrain. Any enemy that hits you with an opportunity attack provoked by this movement takes damage equal to your Strength modifier, and you mark the enemy until the start of your next turn.

Awaken the Celestial Tiger.name: Awaken the Celestial Tiger
Awaken the Celestial Tiger.flavor: As you spring at your enemy, your body transforms into the celestial tigerâ€”a relentless force of unearthly fury.
Awaken the Celestial Tiger.requirement: You must charge and use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
Awaken the Celestial Tiger.attack: Dexterity vs. Reflex. Make the attack twice.
Awaken the Celestial Tiger.onHit: 4d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. If you hit with both attacks, the target takes 2d10 extra damage.
Awaken the Celestial Tiger.effect: You assume the form of the celestial tiger until the end of the encounter. While in this form, you are immune to fear effects, your Flurry of Blows power deals extra damage equal to your Strength modifier, and you gain a +2 power bonus to speed.

Tiger Frenzy.name: Tiger Frenzy
Tiger Frenzy.flavor: Pain clarifies your mind, letting you strike with ease at foes that come too close.
Tiger Frenzy.trigger: You are bloodied by an attack
Tiger Frenzy.effect: Until the stance ends, any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to you takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.
